payload.name: numa-locality
payload.title: NUMA locality: “one rack” isn’t uniform memory
payload.formal: remote NUMA accesses cost more; thread/page placement matters.
payload.apm2_mapping: the analog is “one trust domain isn’t uniform authority.” Inside a rack, some executors should still be isolated (side channels, secrets). Pin high‑risk workloads to isolated domains (35). Also pin data-plane heavy tasks near their storage.
